short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights the product with the highest number of ratings on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Highlight Top Rated Product is a time-saving Chrome extension designed for savvy online shoppers. It effortlessly identifies and highlights the most highly-rated products on amazon webpages. With an intuitive rating slider, you can set your desired minimum rating threshold (e.g., 4.5 stars) to filter and display only top-tier products. This powerful tool ensures you quickly find and select the best products, making your shopping experience efficient and satisfying. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to instant quality with Amazon Highlight Top Rated Product!

Operates seamlessly across all Amazon websites, including those in the UK, US, Latin America, Europe, and more, directly within search results!

Changelog:
v.1.3 (Nov 2024):
1) Fixed premium advanced filtering(one-star) not working

v.1.2 (Nov 2024):
1) Fixed reviews numbers parsing for some countries
2) Added ability to specify max range for inflated currency

v.1.1 (Oct 2024):
1) Added price filters!
2) Increased limits for free users for reviews count (from 25 to 200)
3) Increased limits for free users for min rating condition (from 4.5 to 4.9). 

Now free users can fully enjoy the extension benefits.
